posts.post_content:
This is a hard card to price...but i think [URL="http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-SWEET-CAPORAL-TY-COBB-PORTRAIT-GREEN-PSA-AUTHENTIC-HOF-/171810842790?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item2800b968a6&nma=true&si=q1CKqW%252BSTvjCJv4UCSZfapF9JmE%253D&orig_cvip=true&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2557"]this is a reasonable comparison[/URL] that probably justifies the asking price. 

Asking $450 for this green background Cobb. While it has reasonable low grade appeal, it was returned (many years ago by the previous owner) by SGC as legitimate, but altered to too great of an extent to receive an A...as you can see the lower right hand corner has apparently come off and been repasted. Some other company might holder it, but honestly I don't use ho

Anyway, I have upgraded.  I would also consider trades for players of comparable stature. 

[URL=http://s235.photobucket.com/user/bbcard1/media/IMG_4366_zps5mbvv4er.jpg.html][IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/IMG_4366_zps5mbvv4er.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Any questions just pm me.
